if.if: insert into members (MID, MTYPE, MNAME, BIRTH, GENDER, ADDRESS, EMAIL, PASSWORD, ORGAN, PHONE, POSITION) values (#{mid}, #{mtype}, #{mname}, sysdate, #{gender}, #{address}, #{email}, #{password}, #{organ}, #{phone}, #{position})

insert into members (MID, MTYPE, MNAME, BIRTH, GENDER, ADDRESS, SNO, EMAIL, PASSWORD, ORGAN, PHONE, POSITION) values (#{mid}, #{mtype}, #{mname}, sysdate, #{gender}, #{address}, #{sno}, #{email}, #{password}, #{organ}, #{phone}, #{position})

insert into members (MID, MTYPE, MNAME, BIRTH, GENDER, ADDRESS, EMAIL, PASSWORD, ORGAN, PHONE, POSITION ,FILE_DATA ,FILE_TYPE, FILE_NAME, SAVED_DATE) values (#{mid}, #{mtype}, #{mname}, sysdate, #{gender}, #{address}, #{email}, #{password}, #{organ}, #{phone}, #{position}, #{fileData}, #{fileType}, #{fileName}, #{savedDate} )

insert into members (MID, MTYPE, MNAME, BIRTH, GENDER, ADDRESS, SNO, EMAIL, PASSWORD, ORGAN, PHONE, POSITION ,FILE_DATA ,FILE_TYPE, FILE_NAME, SAVED_DATE) values (#{mid}, #{mtype}, #{mname}, sysdate, #{gender}, #{address}, #{sno}, #{email}, #{password}, #{organ}, #{phone}, #{position}, #{fileData}, #{fileType}, #{fileName}, #{savedDate} )
